body.header: IELTS Writing Task 2You should spend about 40 minutes on this task. You should write at least 250 words.

section.p: Present a written argument or case to an educated reader with no specialist knowledge of the following topic. Many television news programmes show pictures of events in the news which people find upsetting. While television has a duty to report important news, it should not bring disturbing images into people's homes. To what extent do you agree or disagree? You should use your own ideas, knowledge and experience and support your arguments with examples and relevant evidence.
